name: Click Or Treat (LRD)
description:
The dentists are coming to take all the candy! You must stop them!

How To Play:

Click on the spinning candy to get, well candy! Then you can spend that candy to buy more towers and place them on the field! Everytime you buy a tower its cost doubles, so choose wisely! You can also buy powerups to get more candy per second without even having to click!
